Sentencas: Silver-based ceramic composite electrodes are expected to be widely applied in medium- or low temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), SOFCs operated on carbon-containing fuels, and solid oxide electrolysis cells (SOECs).
Titulo: Electrical Performance of Ag-Based Ceramic Composite Electrodes and Their Application in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: To optimize the composition of a silver-based ceramic composite electrode, the performances of Ag-YSZ (yttrium-stabilized zirconia) and Ag-GDC (gadolinium doped ceria) are investigated.
Titulo: Electrical Performance of Ag-Based Ceramic Composite Electrodes and Their Application in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: First, they are used as electrode materials to make symmetric electrodes on a YSZ electrolyte, to which impedance spectra are measured in an ambient atmosphere to evaluate their feasibility as cathode materials.
Titulo: Electrical Performance of Ag-Based Ceramic Composite Electrodes and Their Application in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: It was found that that Ag-YSZ reaches the lowest polarization resistance when the content of Ag is 65% (w, mass fraction), while for Ag-GDC, the value is 70% (w).
Titulo: Electrical Performance of Ag-Based Ceramic Composite Electrodes and Their Application in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The Ag-YSZ and Ag-GDC with the lowest polarization resistance are used as electrode materials to make SOFC single cells whose electrochemical performances are tested.
Titulo: Electrical Performance of Ag-Based Ceramic Composite Electrodes and Their Application in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The polarization resistance of an anode of the SOFCs can be obtained by subtracting the cathode polarization resistance from the overall SOFC polarization resistance.
Titulo: Electrical Performance of Ag-Based Ceramic Composite Electrodes and Their Application in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Both the polarization resistance result and the output performance show that the performance of Ag-GDC is superior to Ag-YSZ as an anode.
Titulo: Electrical Performance of Ag-Based Ceramic Composite Electrodes and Their Application in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In the present work, Ag-YSZ is more suitable as the cathode and the Ag-GDC as the anode.
Titulo: Electrical Performance of Ag-Based Ceramic Composite Electrodes and Their Application in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The present work provides not only useful data for Ag-based composite electrodes but also a method for measuring the polarization resistance of SOFC anodes.
Titulo: Electrical Performance of Ag-Based Ceramic Composite Electrodes and Their Application in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
